experience.title: CapitalRoad Industries
experience.subTitle: Software Developer
description:
CapitalRoad is a small fintech startup that provides a B2B SaaS product to financial advisors
for wealth management. The product includes features such as share trading, custody
management and reporting.

Initially joined as a contract worker, focused on establishing a test framework for a Java EJB
monolithic REST API.

Transitioned to a full-time fullstack software developer role in December 2019, specializing in
frontend development within the main client facing React.js project.

Led the successful migration of the React.js project from class-based to hook-based architecture,
improving code maintainability and performance.

Designed and developed a versatile React component library with Rollup and Storybook, enhancing code
reusability and efficiency across diverse projects.
Kept a keen eye on tools like Google Lighthouse to consistently improve upon the frontends performance, accessibility, best practices and search engine optimization.

Demonstrated commitment to staying current with emerging technologies, consistently
updating and maintaining the project's technology stack.

I was involved in developing a Express.js microservice, which extended our monolithic system by
providing a B2C transaction rollup service that integrated with a clients banking provider.

Contributed to building Java Spring Boot microservices, enhancing system modularity and
scalability.

Exhibited strong client-facing skills, actively engaging with end clients and delivering tailored
solutions.

Spearheaded a project, showcasing leadership and autonomy, delivering a cutting edge-solution
using React.js and Spring Boot technologies to build a B2C extension to our main SaaS product.

my technical background.

projects.title: Capstone Project at RMIT University
projects.subTitle: Virtual Share Trading Game
description:
The project was a virtual share trading game in which users needed the ability to signup, share trade
and view their ranking on a leaderboard.

Over a six-month period, I successfully led a team of three individuals, leveraging agile methodologies
to showcase my leadership and collaboration skills in delivering innovative solutions. We utilized Jira to efficiently manage project deliverables.

Built using a Ruby on Rails backend and a Vue.js frontend, showcasing my ability to work in a fullstack
space.

Deployed to Digital Ocean on their Droplets platform, using Docker and Docker Compose, showcasing
my ability to work with infrastructure technology and minimise costs.
